name: HEN500K Special #1 - Black Ink, Red - Shape 500K/2K #18
description:
In-browser live code, GPU-friendly, Video preview in Mobile
Resizable up to 2K full-screen 1920x1080

HEN500K tribute drawn by 500K Physarum blobs full of black ink on a red page.

This is a biomorphic NFT that is a real microbiome inspired by physarum mold transport (yes really) and evolving forever.

All evolutions might be slighly different due to data<->GPU timing. You can start/stop evolution (left click) to take snapshots.

This NFT is totally autonomous of NFT platform and IPFS. For owners, I can deliver a certificate and an independent package that you can save and re-launch out of platform forever.

WARNINGS:
- Reload if not loading, IPFS can time-out.
- Best on computer with GPU. Don't hesitate to see it in bigger window up to 2K full screen.
- On mobile, it's a video preview as it renders badly due to float precision issues in current WebGL implementation.

This NFT is unique and is part of Shape collection based on the same principles but with very different renderings. Keep up for next tokens.

More information on Readme https://github.com/naibdian/naibdian-collections/tree/main/physarum/shape

You can contact on Twitter @naibdian
